base_interest_rate.benchmark_definition: interest rate per annum for deposits in dollars for a period equal to the relevant interest period which appears on Telerate Page 3750

performance_pricing.definition: Total Debt divided by EBITDA for the period consisting of such fiscal quarter and each of the three immediately preceding fiscal quarters

mandatory_prepayments.definition: EBITDA minus interest expense, scheduled principal repayments, income taxes, capital expenditures, investments, restricted payments, and interest payments
mandatory_prepayments.application: to term loans in order of maturity

mandatory_prepayments.definition: gross cash proceeds from disposition minus reasonable and customary fees, taxes, and payments to retire indebtedness
mandatory_prepayments.application: to term loans in order of maturity

financial_covenants.definition: Total Debt divided by EBITDA for the period consisting of such fiscal quarter and each of the three immediately preceding fiscal quarters
EBITDA minus capital expenditures divided by fixed charges

negative_covenants.description: no additional debt except permitted debt
negative_covenants.exceptions: unsecured indebtedness up to $50,000, capitalized lease liabilities up to $2,000,000

negative_covenants.description: no dividends except from available amount
negative_covenants.available_amount_definition: 50% of cumulative net income from closing date
negative_covenants.exceptions: up to $1,000,000 for management fees, up to $5,000,000 for repurchase of capital securities

events_of_default.description: failure to pay principal when due

events_of_default.threshold_definition: indebtedness exceeding $5mm in aggregate principal amount

fees.rate_basis: basis points per annum on unused commitments
fees.unused_commitment_definition: Total Commitments minus outstanding Loans, as calculated daily

fees.rate_basis: basis points per annum on the stated amount of each letter of credit

security.collateral_description: all assets of borrower and guarantors
security.perfection_requirements: UCC filings, deposit account control agreements

governing_terms.required_lenders_definition: Lenders holding more than 50% of the aggregate Commitments and Loans outstanding
